item.title: Building Information Modelling
item.description: Building Information Modelling (BIM) is a digital representation of the physical and functional characteristics of a facility. It is a collaborative process that allows architects, engineers, and construction professionals to design, construct, and manage buildings and infrastructure projects more efficiently.
